line.comment: * Returns "available", "unlocked", "disabled", "max" or an int from 2 to 10 representing the required level.
* Zero Hour adds Perks with dependencies
* Herobetty 5.4: Cleaned up the code. Removed if-else redundancies for Triple Population Growth, no food, and tax.
* If player joined OCV, player cannot have pirate contract (Xenon/OCV don't make (new) deals with pirates).
* Tax, reputation, food, and unfortunate events are disabled as it's redundant in an OCV playthrough.
* Mordan3. Exceeded number of jump stations.
* Reduced upkeep for newly built ships.

sval.val: Returns "available", "unlocked", "disabled", "max" or an int from 2 to 10 representing the required level.
Zero Hour adds Perks with dependencies
Herobetty 5.4: Cleaned up the code. Removed if-else redundancies for Triple Population Growth, no food, and tax.
If player joined OCV, player cannot have pirate contract (Xenon/OCV don't make (new) deals with pirates).
Tax, reputation, food, and unfortunate events are disabled as it's redundant in an OCV playthrough.
Mordan3. Exceeded number of jump stations.
Reduced upkeep for newly built ships.
